summary:
Tony, to MJ, Ned, Peter, and Shuri: Alright kids, lets have some fun!
Tony: I’ll give you a few minutes to cancel the rest of...
body:
Tony, to MJ, Ned, Peter, and Shuri: Alright kids, lets have some fun!

Tony: I’ll give you a few minutes to cancel the rest of your plans for today!

Peter: No need. My only plans were to buy skittles.

reblog.comment:

summary:
Tony: Dammit, Peter! Does anyone else know?
Peter: Nope! Just you, Ms. Potts, and Crash.
Peter: That’s what I think you should...
body:
Tony: Dammit, Peter! Does anyone else know?

Peter: Nope! Just you, Ms. Potts, and Crash.

Peter: That’s what I think you should name the baby. It works for a boy or a girl.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: From Midnight to Dawn
title: From Midnight to Dawn
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P3l5YU

by TylerReed

Peter Parker is caught robbing a bank by Iron Man, his childhood hero and idol.

Instead of being thrown to a Supermax facility with all the other superpowered villains in New York, Iron Man takes pity, and instead sends Peter to Stark Academy and places him under house arrest. All while sentencing him to 24,000 hours of “community service” to the people of Queens, New York as reparation for his past deeds.

While at Stark Academy, Peter makes quick friends with roommate Harley Keener, Tony’s Stark’s personal protege, one Ned Leeds, a supernerd genius engineer, and MJ Watson, one of the brightest legal minds of the century. Together with Harry Osborn, future president of the billionaire company Oscorp, the Genius Quintet of Stark Academy becomes just the thing that the underdogs of New York desperately needs.

Unfortunately, while trying to learn how to be a hero, tap into the talents that Tony Stark sees in him, make his Uncle Ben proud, redeem himself for all things he’s done, and take care of his terminally ill Aunt May, Peter will fall under temptation by the seedier side of New York, namely one Wilson Fisk, who’d do just about anything to have his “Spidertheif” back.

Words: 7193, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Harley Keener, Ned Leeds, Mary Jane Watson, Harry Osborn, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Wilson Fisk, May Parker (Spider-Man), Pepper Potts
  • Additional Tags: Iron Dad, spider son, Tony Stark Basically Adopts Harley & Peter, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Parent Tony Stark, Learning the difference between good and evil, Peter Learns to Become a Heor, Peter Learns to Love Himself, Peter Learns to Trust Others, Genius Teenagers, Stark Academy for the Gifted and Talented


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P3l5YU

title: We're In This Together
body:

by Unbreakable92

When organizing themselves to go into hibernation over the cold months, Tony injures himself while playing with Bruce. At first, it doesn’t seem so bad but it starts a sequence of events that will have Steve, Thor, Clint and Natasha struggling to keep their little family together.

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: Dark Side
title: Dark Side
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2xKxgTG

by DarkArchangelofVengeance

Tony stark once told Steve Rogers: I don’t trust a guy without a dark side. He never imagined Steve had the darkest dark side of them all and it was just waiting to be let out.

Steve Rogers inherited a genetic curse from his father. Because of it, he has mirror shards in his eyes and heart like in the old fairy tale the Snow Queen that threaten to turn him dark at a moment’s notice. The mirror comes with ice powers and a cold heart to match should Steve succumb to the curse. He was always able to stay good, though. He fought long and hard and with his best friend Bucky’s help, he managed it. That all changed when while Team Cap was on the run from Ross, Steve sacrificed himself and was taken to the Raft. Determined to get the super soldier serum, Ross experiments on Steve until it becomes too much.

No one can hide from an unbreakable curse forever.

Based on May Deitrick’s the Mirror Trilogy and Marvel’s Captain America/the Avengers.

Words: 1973, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Captain America (Movies), Captain America - All Media Types, The Mirror - Fandom, The Mirror Trilogy
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Steve Rogers, Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Natasha Romanoff, Sam Wilson
  • Relationships: Steve Rogers & Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes & Steve Rogers, Steve Rogers & Sam Wilson, Steve Rogers & Natasha Romanov

by DarkArchangelofVengeance

Tony stark once told Steve Rogers: I don’t trust a guy without a dark side. He never imagined Steve had the darkest dark side of them all and it was just waiting to be let out.

Steve Rogers inherited a genetic curse from his father. Because of it, he has mirror shards in his eyes and heart like in the old fairy tale the Snow Queen that threaten to turn him dark at a moment’s notice. The mirror comes with ice powers and a cold heart to match should Steve succumb to the curse. He was always able to stay good, though. He fought long and hard and with his best friend Bucky’s help, he managed it. That all changed when while Team Cap was on the run from Ross, Steve sacrificed himself and was taken to the Raft. Determined to get the super soldier serum, Ross experiments on Steve until it becomes too much.

No one can hide from an unbreakable curse forever.

Based on May Deitrick’s the Mirror Trilogy and Marvel’s Captain America/the Avengers.

summary: From Midnight to Dawn
title: From Midnight to Dawn
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P3l5YU

by TylerReed

Peter Parker is caught robbing a bank by Iron Man, his childhood hero and idol.

Instead of being thrown to a Supermax facility with all the other superpowered villains in New York, Iron Man takes pity, and instead sends Peter to Stark Academy and places him under house arrest. All while sentencing him to 24,000 hours of “community service” to the people of Queens, New York as reparation for his past deeds.

While at Stark Academy, Peter makes quick friends with roommate Harley Keener, Tony’s Stark’s personal protege, one Ned Leeds, a supernerd genius engineer, and MJ Watson, one of the brightest legal minds of the century. Together with Harry Osborn, future president of the billionaire company Oscorp, the Genius Quintet of Stark Academy becomes just the thing that the underdogs of New York desperately needs.

Unfortunately, while trying to learn how to be a hero, tap into the talents that Tony Stark sees in him, make his Uncle Ben proud, redeem himself for all things he’s done, and take care of his terminally ill Aunt May, Peter will fall under temptation by the seedier side of New York, namely one Wilson Fisk, who’d do just about anything to have his “Spidertheif” back.

Words: 7193, Chapters: 1/10, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Harley Keener, Ned Leeds, Mary Jane Watson, Harry Osborn, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Wilson Fisk, May Parker (Spider-Man), Pepper Potts
  • Additional Tags: Iron Dad, spider son, Tony Stark Basically Adopts Harley & Peter, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Parent Tony Stark, Learning the difference between good and evil, Peter Learns to Become a Heor, Peter Learns to Love Himself, Peter Learns to Trust Others, Genius Teenagers, Stark Academy for the Gifted and Talented


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2P3l5YU

blog.description:
.They didn't said these things... or did they?
Just another blog of incorrect quotes for the marvel cinematic universe. 
Feel free to request or send something.

summary:
Tony: Holy shit, you're so beautiful.
Tony: Will you marry me?
Pepper, blushing: We've literally been married for 6 years,...
body:
Tony: Holy shit, you're so beautiful.
Tony: Will you marry me?
Pepper, blushing: We've literally been married for 6 years, please stop doing this.
